articles.description: Triathlete Alex Yee and the women’s quad sculls rowers win Britain’s fifth and sixth gold medals at the Paris Olympics.
articles.title: Paris Olympics: Alex Yee and women's quad sculls rowers win golds

articles.description: Great Britain's Beth Potter wins Olympic triathlon bronze after the race is cleared to go ahead at Paris 2024 following days of uncertainty over the water quality in the River Seine.
articles.title: Olympic triathlon: Great Britain's Beth Potter wins bronze at Paris 2024

articles.description: Team GB's rowers win gold in the women's quadruple sculls after the men finish fourth.
articles.title: Team GB rowers win gold in women's quadruple sculls after men finish fourth

articles.description: Your day-by-day guide to what is happening when - and who to watch out for - at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics schedule & day-by-day guide to key events & British medal hopes at Paris 2024

articles.description: Find out the medal table from the Paris Olympics 2024, including overall medals, gold medals, silver medals and bronze medals for Team GB and other countries.
articles.title: Olympic Medal Table - Paris 2024 gold, silver & bronze tally

articles.description: Brazil great Marta goes off in tears after being shown a red card against Spain at the Olympic women's football tournament.
articles.title: Olympic women's football: Marta goes off in tears after red card

articles.description: Tottenham and South Korea captain Son Heung-min scores twice as Spurs beat Team K League 4-3, while Newcastle beat Uruwa Red Diamonds 4-1.
articles.title: Team K League 3-4 Tottenham: Son Heung-min scores twice as Spurs win in Korea

articles.description: Great Britain's Kieran Reilly secures BMX freestyle silver in a dramatic final in Paris.
articles.title: Kieran Reilly secures Paris 2024 Olympics silver for Great Britain in BMX freestyle

articles.description: Former Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp says taking the England job would be "the biggest loss of face in the history of football".
articles.title: Jurgen Klopp distances himself from England job

articles.description: Andrea Spendolini-Sirieix and Lois Toulson win Great Britain’s third diving medal at the Paris Olympics by snatching bronze at the last in the women's synchronised 10m platform.
articles.title: Olympic diving: Team GB's Andrea Spendolini-Sirieix and Lois Toulson snatch diving bronze
